#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 100000
int res[MAX];
int multiply(int x,int res[],int res_size);
void factorial(int n)
{
int res_size=1;
res[0]=1;
for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
{
res_size=multiply(i,res,res_size);
}
for(int i=res_size-1;i>=0;i--)
{
cout<<res[i];
}
}
int multiply(int x,int res[],int res_size)
{
int carry=0;
for(int i=0;i<res_size;i++)
{
int prod=x*res[i]+carry;
res[i]=prod%10;
carry=prod/10;
}
while(carry)
{
res[res_size]=carry%10;
carry=carry/10;
res_size++;
}
return res_size;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        factorial(n);
        cout<<endl;
    }
//factorial(10000);
return 0;
}
